description.searchIntervalMonths: How often to search each software already in database (1, 2, 3, etc. months)
description.minDelayMinutes: Minimum wait time between automation runs for existing software (in minutes)
description.maxDelayMinutes: Maximum wait time between automation runs for existing software (in minutes)

newSoftware.minDelayMinutes: Minimum wait time between new software searches (in minutes)
newSoftware.maxDelayMinutes: Maximum wait time between new software searches (in minutes)
newSoftware.sourceFile: Path to file containing new software names (one per line)
newSoftware.searchKeywords: Array of keywords to append to software names (e.g. 'coupon code', 'discount'). Use (2), (3) after software name to select specific keyword.
